title: The Story of A Street Cat Named Bob: A Special Two-Book Omnibus
description: A two-volume omnibus edition fo A Street Cat Named Bob and its sequel The World According to Bob, the phenomenal best-selling story of the best friends James and Bob. A Street Cat Named Bob introduces us to James Bowen, a busker living hand to mouth on the streets of London, who returns to his sheltered accommodation one day to find an injured ginger street cat curled up in the hallway. James cannot resist helping the cat, whom he quickly christens Bob. The two grow inseparable, and their comic and occasionally dangerous adventures together slowly transform their lives, healing the scars of each other's troubled pasts.The World According to Bob continues their story together as James, with Bob's help, finds his way back to the real world. As they high five together for crowds of admirers, James knows that the tricks he's taught Bob are nothing compared to the lessons he's learnt from this street-wise cat.The full, moving and uplifting story of a man and his cat has touched the hearts of people all over the world - and that has now become the major motion picture A Street Cat Named Bob.
author: James Bowen
